Judul: Structural Micromodulation on Bi3+-Doped Ba2Ga2GeO7 Phosphor with Considerable Tunability of the Defect-Oriented Optical Properties
Abstrak: We report a new Ba2Ga2GeO7:Bi3+ phosphor with broad emission almost covers the entire visible area generated from different bismuth emission centers in crystalline structure. The two peaks’ positions are invariably located at 497 and 611 nm which were independently excited by 365 and 387 nm excitation sources.....
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Ran Pang, Yanqing Luo, Haiyan Wu, Su Zhang, Lihong Jiang, Da Li, Chengyu Li, Hongjie Zhang
Kata Kunci: phosphor, luminescence, bismuth, WLEDs, vacancy, color-tunable
